alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana and northeastern Newton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burr Ferry, or 7 miles east of Toledo Bend Dam, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Toledo Bend Dam, and Burr Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
